entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
